channel.title: SFM
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SFM, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon reports first-quarter earnings after the bell
item.description: Amazon is releasing its first earnings results since President Donald Trump announced sweeping new tariffs.

item.title: Microsoft pops 9% after earnings beat, on pace for best day in 5 years
item.description: Microsoft shares popped after the software giant issued strong guidance and robust cloud growth drove a top- and bottom-line beat.

item.title: Eli Lilly's earnings beat is clouded by Novo news. What it means for investors
item.description: We suspect the CVS Health change, which goes into effect on July 1, could put a temporary overhang on Eli Lilly shares.

item.title: Spin purgatory: How DuPont and Honeywell shares have battled ahead of their splits
item.description: For years, an unsettling pattern has cast a cloud over Wall Street. Companies with spinoff plans often see their stocks struggle.

item.title: Meta Platforms jumps 4% on earnings beat, advertising resilience
item.description: Investors this earnings season are watching for signs that President Donald Trump's tariff push and global trade uncertainty are hampering advertising...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trumpâ€™s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
